live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Estimated Time of Resolution 14:30PM CT, Thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
30784.summary: Some customers in the Bronx area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
30784.title: Dec 21 – Winnipeg (Bronx) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
